definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another

sentences.english: Jessica's musical talents range from singing opera to playing the electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 杰西卡很有音乐天分，从唱歌剧到弹电吉他她都会。

sentences.english: Sure. Do you want an acoustic one or an electric one?
sentences.chinese: 当然。您想要买木吉他还是电吉他？

sentences.english: A door cracks open, and a blast of electric guitar erupts into the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 门开着一道缝，电吉他的爆鸣透过门缝传到走廊上。

sentences.english: Modern additions might include drums, electric guitars, and saxophones.
sentences.chinese: 现代乐器也包括鼓，电吉他，和萨克斯。

sentences.english: The first ever electic guitar, the 'Frying Pan', is also on display.
sentences.chinese: 展览上还展出了第一把电吉他“煎熬的潘”。

sentences.english: The wall beside the house was decorated in graffiti, mostly of electric-guitar outlines.
sentences.chinese: 房子旁边的墙上涂鸦装饰，主要是电吉他的轮廓。
